product_name: Keen Helena Winter Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for snowbound adventures, the women's Keen Helena winter boots help keep your feet warm and dry, with special KEEN.WARM(TM) technology that retains maximum heat on the inside. Nubuck leather uppers not only look great but withstand harsh conditions; lacing system supplies a snug, secure fit without fuss. KEEN.DRY(TM) waterproof, breathable membranes keep feet dry while dissipating moisture inside the boots. 200g KEEN.WARM insulation uses a mix of charcoaled bamboo and polyester fibers to ensure warmth and comfort in chilly conditions. Faux fur linings wick moisture and improve thermal regulation; linings are rolled over at top for comfort and a touch of classic style. Compression-molded EVA midsoles topped with removable EVA footbeds offer shock absorption and padding for all-day comfort. Thermoplastic urethane shanks enhance support and stability for handling changing terrain. Toe caps on the Keen Helena boots help protect boots and feet from bumps and abrasion. Nonmarking, dual-climate rubber outsoles feature temperature-sensitive lugs that harden in cold weather to supply better traction on ice. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for snowbound adventures, the women's Keen Helena winter boots help keep your feet warm and dry, with special KEEN.WARM(TM) technology that retains maximum heat on the inside.
